text: Sormovsky (masculine), Sormovskaya (feminine), or Sormovskoye (neuter) is an adjective form of Sormovo, a neighborhood within the Russian city of Nizhny Novgorod. They may refer to: *Sormovsky City District, a city district of Nizhny Novgorod, Russia *Sormovskaya Line, a line of the Nizhny Novgorod Metro that will one day reach Sormovo. ==See also== * Sormovo (disambiguation)
title: Sormovsky
